objective1: Choose 2 of the 5 senses. Use that sense in 4 descriptions.
objective2: Choose another sense. Use that sense in 4 descriptions, too.

objective1: Mention 3 internal organs, besides your heart and lungs.
Mention a different illness in response to 3 questions.
objective2: Cough or sneeze. (If this completes your obsession, wait 30 seconds to stand up.)
